Typography Utilities Classes

Spacing in SparkUI is use the 8-point grid concept, we start from the space of 8px, we increase by 8 if we need bigger spacing

spacing in sparkUI you the typical following numbers 2, 4, 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, 64 and 72 8px is the base multiplier, we refer to it by --1x if you to need step, increase this multiplier, for example if you need a padding of margin of 40px divide 40 by 8 and your modifier class should end by --5x

here we have two special cases which are 2px and 4px refere to them by --quarter-x and --half-x
